batchrating-error-no-titles: You must supply the names of the pages to be rated!
batchrating-fail: Failed updated the following {{PLURAL:$1|page's rating|pages' ratings}}: $2
batchrating-success: Successfully updated the following {{PLURAL:$1|page's rating|pages' ratings}}: $2
batchrating-text:
Use the form below to quickly rate multiple pages at once. Write each page name on its own line.
Each rating change will use the summary message defined at [[MediaWiki:Batchrating-log-summary]] as the log message which gets written to [[Special:Log/ratings]].
changerating-intro-text: What would you like to change ''$1'''s rating to?
changerating-error-invalid-rating: The given identifier is not a valid known rating code(name)
changerating-error-no-changes-requested: You must choose a different rating than the current one!
changerating-no-such-page: Sorry, the page "$1" does not exist.
log-description-ratings: This log shows all the recent changes to pages' ratings.
logentry-ratings-change: $1 changed the rating of $3 from $5 to $4
ratings-desc: A complex interface for rating pages
right-batch-rate: Change the ratings of multiple pages at once
are-disallowed: Ratings have been disallowed for this namespace
action-batch-rate: change multiple articles' ratings at once
changerating-log-text: Past rating changes on this article:
